Update 11-12-25: Added gunsight for the XF5U-1 Flying Flapjack

US PLANE SIGHT DUMP PACK. Includes gunsights for all listed planes, as well as M8 rocket sights for the P-39/P-63 and Tiny Tim sight for the F7F-3. Includes: B-25, B-26, BTD-1, A-36, F4F, F7F, P-36, P-39, P-4...

Radial sights for modern vehicles. (Experimental)

The triangles on each side rotate based on your zeroing. It has no ranges so use these sights only with laser rangefinder.

Also in "Sight settings" add custom Rangefinder because the scaling from different zooms means I cannot place them in a good position. While the ingame custom rangefinder is perfect for that.

Edit-> version 1.1

#collimator #sight #fw190 #bf109 #Pb2 #Wb.21

Sight for Fw190F8 & Bf109G-6 (edit 29/12 !!!!!)

Sight for Pb2 & Wb.21 ​​missiles:
-Set the range input to 800
-Decide which missile you are shooting (the left one always shoots first)
-Place the enemy in the distance square
-Then aim at the red one and the missile will approximately hit the target

для изменения размера полос крутите цифры в блокноте тут:

lineSizeMult:r=1.3

Some Bradley Sights

Merry ... Day After Christmas ... Well maybe not for some of you ...

50 mark is about where the ATGM starts guiding, it will hit there at 50m assuming the launcher is stable (ie you didn't break hard before firing it)

the sim sight only works with the sabot not the dart, I don't have the m3a3 so its just for the 8.3 one

it also one provides more stable ATGM control, but it isn't really needed as much post TOW buff

well I hope you guys like these, download, unzip, paste folder into UserSights and merge it with the bradley one if you have the sights alre...

Simple Sight V3

installation:
1. extract UserSight folder into war thunder directory
2. apply under Option > Ground vehicles battle settings > sight settings > reticle

the one with range indicator is for non-laser rangefinder or low velocity shell

based on: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1101996/en/

GI - Xianyun sight for all tanks

Requested by: cluckcluck1111@psn

#genshin_impact #genshin #xianyun #anime #all_tanks

A custom MBT sight, that can be used on all tanks.

Installation: Create a folder for the tank that you want to use it on in the UserSights folder, and drag the .blk file into the folder.

After that, you can select the sight from sight settings menu in the reticle option.

Feel free to edit the sight, for example add custom text.

Here's a simplified user sight I made and used for years.
Update 2.43 made a huge change in adjustable font size, so now it works for all tanks, and you don't have to create a separate folder to fit each tank anymore.

*NOTE*: As of January 20th, the font size is no longer "self-adjustable" (it remains the same size even if you zoom in), so they look bigger for some tanks with APFSDS and insane zoom (e.g. CV90-120). Not sure if this is a bug and if it will be fixed.

All you need to do is to put the file "2EZ" or the folder "all_tanks" into the "UserSights<...

I don't make sights I just use them frequently, figured id post this since I haven't seen anyone else do it. None of the sights are mine. Credit to @Rastmust for the sights

-These are for 1440p resolution if you want the 1080p or 4k versions download the sights from the original post (https://live.warthunder.com/post/1111735/en/) and put into the folders I made in this post.
